title.rendered: French Bistro Side chair – Powder Coated

content.rendered:
The French Bistro Side chair is a fully welded stool made from mild
steel, then powder coated to any colour to suit your needs. This enhances
the attraction of the chair, making it a unique feature. The French
Bistro Side chair and its related items are very popular with cafe’s,
bars, restaurants and many other venues.

The French Bistro Side chair is stackable and is only suitable for
indoor use. This is a high quality, commercial grade item.

The French Bistro Side chair can come in any colour for
quantities of 10 or more at no extra cost. For quantities of 9 or
less there will be a set up fee. Individual powder coating fees are included in the prices shown.

Held in stock in a Matt Grey. All other colours: 14 Working Days. Upholstery extra lead time of: 10 Working Days.

1 Year structural guarantee on the French Bistro Items & a 1 year guarantee on the finish/lacquer.
